products.title: Cotswold, Ebony - Venetian Blind
products.description: Cotswold ebony allows you to take modern decor in an exciting new direction with its unique blend of contemporary colour and classic form. With a slight satin finish sitting against a backdrop of natural light you'll gain a new appreciation for the finer things in life. Turn the master bedroom into your own little oasis away from it all with a little help from cotswold ebony. By opting for crisp white sheets and a selection of ebony scatter cushions, and a matching rug, you'll be able to transform your room in a single afternoon.

products.title: Cotswold, Smoke Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: With the faint sheen of its satin paint, the cotswold in smoke grey places a pale grey tone on thick wooden slats, which are treated to prevent cracking and warping, ensuring that this blind will stand the test of time. A matching pelmet, rails, and acorns provide a sleek and unobstructed appearance. Fashion a plain bedroom into a trendy, up-to-date designer haven by pitting the smoke grey against sunny primrose yellow walls.

products.title: Cotswold, Oyster - Venetian Blind
products.description: Bring a subtle sense of class to your home by blending in the cotswold in oyster, a painted, satin-finish venetian blind with a beautiful cream tone. Its luxe colour even stretches to its included accessories, such as the wooden pelmet and bottom rail. For a bright and summery vibe, all year round, pair the oyster with pretty coral hues, in varying tones. Paint a window wall in the master bedroom a bold and vivacious coral, and accent matching cream bedlinen with coral-toned cushions and throws.

products.title: English Oak Wooden Blind - 50mm Slat
products.description: Not too light, not too dark. Just perfect. Very simply this is one of their best selling blinds, the classic oak stained timber is loved and adored by many. Wooden blinds look sensational in any room; they add such undeniable style wherever they are hung. In the case of englis not too light, not too dark.

Real grains run through the slats to add plenty of depth to the look, while a gorgeous woodgrain texture that is matched with an exquisite natural tone.

products.description: A traditionally coloured blind, the origin deluxe in old walnut displays a dark-medium wood with a natural, matt finish. Embrace the inherent class of the old walnut and group it with similarly traditional colours and furnishings. For a simple yet effective style in the living room, opt for cream walls and sofas, and wooden flooring and furniture.
